name: Brainsonic
tag_list: rich-media, webtv, video, internet, web, broadcast, encoding, intranet, media, communication, live-event
overview:
Brainsonic has all the skills for the development of WebTVs and 2.0 community portals, rich media production (videochats, webcasts, broadcast of live events, video e-mail, 3D video, performance video etc.), hosting and referencing of videos (VSEO).

With the desire to make the use of video for marketing and communication widespread, Brainsonic, now with over 50 partner agencies such as DDB, Digitas, Entrecom, Ogilvy, TBWA etc. has been able to attract and retain large companies such as Auchan, BNP Paribas, Bouygues, EMI, General Electric, IBM, La Mondiale, Microsoft, Oracle, Orange, PPR, Societe Generale, SAS, SFR, Spie, Sun, Vinci etc.

Solutions and packages :

  • Rich Media content production, 3D video, viral campaigns, Web TV news etc. In late 2008 Brainsonic acquired OnePoint TV, the leading provider of interactive videos developed in a virtual 3D environment for marketing, communications and e-learning applications.

  • Implementation of WebTV, an advanced player and other video websites. Today over a hundred WebTV portals are deployed for large companies in Internet (Accenture, Les Echos, Rothschild etc.) or Intranet (Sodexo) contexts.

  • Video referencing solutions (vseo)

  • Command of all video broadcasting and Rich Media technologies Broadcast of live events on the Internet and on Intranets: Every month Brainsonic produces several significant live broadcasts, with thousands or tens of thousands of users connected to the Brainsonic Live platform. This platform, completely customisable to conform with the customerâ€™s in-house style, enables the broadcast, not only of video streaming, but also the hosting and running of live broadcasts with chats, FAQs, surveys, questionnaires, etc.

  • Implementation of 2.0 community portals around the MySlideo platform deployed internally (e.g. Auchan & Renault) and externally (e.g. HR Access, Humanessence, etc.)
